name: Katja Wildermuth
background: Katja Wildermuth serves as Commissioning Editor, Science and Knowledge at 3sat. Focus areas: Science, education, knowledge. They are looking for: Science docs with intellectual depth; educational programming fostering critical thinking. Overall network strategy: 3sat seeks intellectually stimulating documentary and specialist factual content with cultural, scientific and societal relevance for German-speaking audiences across Germany, Austria and Switzerland.
thematic_priorities: Commissioner-specific: Science docs with intellectual depth; educational programming fostering critical thinking
Intellectually stimulating documentaries with cultural relevance
Literary and artistic documentaries focusing on German-language culture
Social documentaries examining contemporary issues in German-speaking countries
Science documentaries with intellectual depth and educational value
Historical documentaries focusing on German-speaking regions
Educational programming that stimulates critical thinking
Preferred format: Singles (45–60 minutes) or series (3–5 episodes)
target_audience: German-speaking audiences in Germany, Austria and Switzerland

additional_info.commissioning_cycles: Ongoing; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific
additional_info.strategic_shifts: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach
additional_info.diversity_inclusion: Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen
additional_info.regional_production: Support for projects from across German regions (where applicable)
